text: avann kaṣṭata bādhiccatinu śēṣaṁ nam'muṭe pakkal ninnuḷḷa kāruṇyaṁ nāṁ avann anubhavippiccāl tīrccayāyuṁ avan paṟayuṁ: it enikk avakāśappeṭṭatākunnu. antyasamayaṁ nilavil varumenn ñān vicārikkunnilla. ini enṟe rakṣitāviṅkalēkk ñān tiriccayakkappeṭukayāṇeṅkilēā enikk avanṟe aṭukkal tīrccayāyuṁ ēṟṟavuṁ meccappeṭṭa nila tanneyāṇuṇṭāyirikkuka. ennāl satyaniṣēdhikaḷkk avar pravartticcatineppaṟṟi nāṁ vivaraṁ nalkukayuṁ kaṭhinamāya śikṣayil ninn nāṁ avarkk anubhavippikkukayuṁ ceyyuṁ
